nodes.text: You return to the village, the sealed clapper in hand.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You've returned. And you bring the clapper.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You have done well. The village is saved.
The Elder takes the clapper and climbs to the bell tower.
Moments later, the bell rings. Clear. Pure. Familiar.
Time flows correctly again. The sun sets at the proper hour.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: You have saved us. The past is buried, as it should be.

nodes.speaker: Elder
nodes.text: We can live in peace now.
The companion stands beside you, gazing at the bell. They say nothing.
The bell rings. Everything is as it was.
But you know the silence beneath the sound.
